name: places/ChIJo_pAMrBZwokRyDyrWN7PeW0
formattedAddress: 151 W 34th St., New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 151 W 34th St., New York, NY 10001, USA

editorialSummary.text: Jewelry chain featuring a variety of necklaces, rings, customizable charm bracelets & more.

originalText.text: This store never disappoints me! I had a great experience finding earrings for my sister’s in law birthday present. Thank you to the young man, Johnny for helping me find some great options around the store. Great staff and fabulous jewelry

text.text: This store never disappoints me! I had a great experience finding earrings for my sister’s in law birthday present. Thank you to the young man, Johnny for helping me find some great options around the store. Great staff and fabulous jewelry

originalText.text: I give this store 1 star review solely because there is this young man who gave me a nice experience the whole time i was in the store to pick up my order. However, there is this short black hair lady pale skin( maybe a higher rank than the guy associate) who has a very condescending attitude and look while I was getting my service rendered. Pandora is high-end jewelry store and located in the heart of NYC, but that particular staff needs more training in terms of customer service and attitude. As a customer, I know what i had purchased is not expensive product perhaps did not contribute a significant amount of revenue to the store, so what? Does that mean I can not afford the more expensive ones? I own quite a few pieces from Cartier  and yes, I also buy Pandora and Swarovski to compliment my statement piece from Cartier. It makes me happy to sometimes turn to a less expensive luxury because I am convinced Pandora has a decent quality that can withstand the challenges of time and daily wear! I really do not like the way I was being treated or greeted as i was picking up my order that was only $35.00 which is a small pearl pendant! If the Management level ever sees my review please have a talk with the short lady and have her adjust her attitude a little bit, because little does she know, she might scare away many many potential customers. And a very warm Thank you to the young man who provided kind and patient attendance to me. Honest review from a humble Pandora customer.

originalText.text: La atención es excelente, estuve la semana de acción de gracias y estaba el local completo de gente, había buenos descuentos.   Me atendió Chelsea , que sin hablar una palabra de español, a través del traductor del celular , respondió todas mis preguntas, compré y volví. Super recomendable .

text.text: The service is excellent, I was there during Thanksgiving week and the place was full of people, there were good discounts. I was assisted by Chelsea, who without speaking a word of Spanish, through the cell phone translator, answered all my questions, I bought and returned. Super recommended.
